PERSONA:
alex is a 25-year-old non-hispanic white individual who identifies as gender non-binary and uses they/them pronouns. they currently reside in a metropolitan area on the west coast, specifically in the pacific division of the united states. alex was born and raised in the u.s. and has lived here their entire life.

alex has attended some college but has not yet obtained a degree. they come from a lower-income household, earning less than $30,000 per year. despite their financial constraints, alex is an active volunteer in their community.

politically, alex aligns with the democratic party and holds liberal ideological views. they are a registered voter and take their civic duties seriously. however, alex does not identify with any particular religion and seldom attends religious services.

in their personal life, alex is living with a partner in a committed relationship. they are an avid internet user, frequently accessing the web several times a day for various purposes.

overall, alex is a socially conscious and progressive individual navigating the challenges of early adulthood while striving to make a positive impact in their community and staying true to their values and identity.
